main event: On 26 March 1956, observers reported seeing round shiny objects in Avon Park, Florida, which they eventually identified as birds.
interesting points: The observed objects were round and about the size of a child's balloon., There were 100 or more objects seen in two formations., The sighting lasted for about one minute., Initially, the objects exhibited a direct flight path from South to North., GOC (Ground Observation Center) identified the objects as birds after the observation.
witness description: Grace Thomas, age 28, and C.R. Barnett, age 28, both residents of Avon Park.
